1319590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Xothian Legends: The Vault of Yigthrahotep
1319590.description:
Xothian Legends: The Vault of Yigthrahotep

Aross the scorched heat of the barren desert lie the jungled hills of Shoma, where the crazed queen of a lost tribe jealously guards a mine that contains untold riches. But in the quest for the buried gold, what terrors might be awakened that slumber in the prehuman vaults beneath the mine...?
This edition of the classic adventure by Xoth Dot Net is converted for use with the Barbarians of Lemuria: Mythic Edition, and includes all-new floorplans and maps.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Marcus Hill
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Barbarians of Lemuria ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
